name: Hydrograph Units Definitons File
summary: Learn about .HCU files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Pre-installed HCU files should not be modified since they contain standard definitions for English and Metric systems.

description: File used by HydroCAD, a CAD program that helps to design water drainage solutions; contains unit definitions for the HydroCAD project in text format; represents one of several files that comprise a HydroCAD project.
